OpenSSO
ssoAdminTools.zip
checksum=ssoAdminTools.zip.sha 		OpenSSO Commandline Tool, this tool is used to manage service configuration and metadata.
opensso.war
checksum=opensso.war.sha 		OpenSSO WAR file, this WAR is deployable on all J2EE compliant Web Container. After deploying it, you can configure the server via a JSP page.
fam-samples.war
checksum=fam-samples.war.sha 		OpenSSO WAR file with server samples, this WAR is a super set of fam.war with some server side samples to demonstrate Identity Federation and Web Services features.
opensso-clientsamples.war
checksum=opensso-clientsamples.war.sha 		OpenSSO Client Samples WAR file, this WAR is deployable on all J2EE compliant Web Container. After deploying it, you can configure the client sample to communicate with a server instance.
openssoclientsdk.jar
checksum=openssoclientsdk.jar.sha 		OpenSSO Client SDK jar file, this jar could be used in a client application to communicate with a server instance.
opensso-server-test.zip
checksum=opensso-server-test.zip.sha 		Developer's Unit Test (Server)
